samples.context: The stomach is a bag-like organ. Highly muscular walls of the stomach help in churning the food. The walls of stomach secrete hydrochloric acid. Hydrochloric acid kills the germs which may be present in food.
samples.question: What role does hydrochloric acid play in the stomach?
